description: Refactors existing code to improve readability, maintainability, or performance without changing external behavior.

inputs.name: target_file
inputs.description: Path to the file to refactor.

inputs.name: selection_start
inputs.description: Start line of code selection for refactoring.

inputs.name: selection_end
inputs.description: End line of code selection for refactoring.

inputs.name: new_name
inputs.description: New name for variable/component/hook if applicable.

outputs.name: modified_files
outputs.description: List of files that were modified during refactoring.
